questions.text: Who is the newest member of "The Clique"?
questions.explanation:
Claire Lyons.

	Claire lives in Massie's guesthouse.

Merri-Lee Marvil.

	Merri-Lee Marvil does a talk show called "The Daily Grind".

questions.text: Who actually wins the uniform contest, although they do not get credit for it?
questions.explanation:
Massie & Claire.

	Alicia & Olivia got credit for winning, but did not actually win.

questions.text: Who do BOTH Dylan and Kristen like?
questions.explanation:
Derrington.

	Derrington likes Massie.   We find this out in the book "Best Friends For Never".

questions.text: In the book "Invasion of the Boy Snatchers", who is the cat burglar?
In the book "Revenge of the Wannabees", who does Alicia get to replace Dylan and Kristen?
questions.explanation:
Kori and Strawberry.

	Alicia got Kori and Strawberry to replace Kristen and Dylan because she and Massie were fighting.

questions.text: What did Claire go as for Halloween?
questions.explanation:
Blossom.

	She was Blossom because her brother and his friend needed the third Powerpuff Girl.

questions.text: What did Massie and her friends go as for Halloween?
questions.explanation:
Dirty Devil.

	Originally, Claire was also supposed to be a Dirty Devil.

questions.text: Who is constantly on a diet?
questions.explanation:
Dylan.

	Dylan plans to use her new body to get Derrington.

questions.text: Who lives in the Brickview Apartments?
questions.explanation:
Kristen.

	Kristen lives in the Brickview because her parents are poor.
